title: Seduction of a King
description: There is a world…Hidden beneath us…Where Once Upon a Time…Becomes corrupted with excess and control…And when Kayden Daniels is thrown from being a New York City millionaireInto the world of Wonderland…His destiny of becoming The Mad Hatter will begin…In the first installment of The Back Road to Wonderland… Finding himself in a strange world, Kayden begins his exploration of Wonderland and his journey to becoming The Mad Hatter. Infatuated with the devilishly handsome King of Hearts, our sex crazed hero decides nothing will stand in his way when it comes to pursuing the luscious closeted King.The Queen of Hearts always gets what she wants or it’s off to the gallows and right now, she wants Kayden. However, when she begins to question if the stranger is who he says he is; she decides to employ other tactics.The King of Hearts has always had desires for men, but afraid to act upon them. That is until he meets Kayden. Will Kayden be the first to break down his fears and his closet door? Can Kayden escape the Queens clutches and desires long enough to achieve his goal and his seduction of a King?
author: David R. Metheny
